A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm so angry at Disney for this movie. They took some of the greatest characters in cinematic history and  destroyed their essential character by making choices for them which\, based on the original trilogy\, these characters would never have made.  Not to mention the lazy writing and unbelievably huge plot holes they expect us as an audience to simply ignore. Easily the worst movie out of the 8\, including the prequels\, which is really saying something.
